title: Relational Language Instructional Design for Transformative Sustainability Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational methodologies, sustainability concept comprehension, and foundational language curriculum competencies (reading, writing, grammar)
context.additional_context: Explores methods for pre-service and in-service teachers to integrate sustainability concepts into language curricula. Emphasizes text analysis and sharing activities using smartphone-based collaborative tools.

learning_goals: Developing the ability to design projects that integrate sustainability concepts (personal, social, and ecological dimensions) with reading and writing activities in language classes.
Establishing an equity-based collaborative system among learners and practicing communication skills using relational learning strategies.
Strengthening competencies in developing and implementing language education content based on transformative learning theory, while enhancing critical thinking skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
